message:
Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is truly invaluable to you. This product holds immense significance and has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. I understand its worth to you is $800,000, and I am confident it will bring immense value to your endeavors.

As the owner of this product, I am offering it to you at a special price, recognizing the importance it holds for you. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring that you receive the best possible deal while also allowing me to realize the full potential value of the product.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need further information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to provide you with all the details necessary to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice
